name: The Photo Retoucher
tag_list: photo-retouching, image-editing, retouching-skin, hair-retoucher, photo-editor, glamour, beauty, beauty-editing
overview:
Photo retouching and image retouching for commercial, magazines, fashion models and agencies

I have a good grounding in art and design and a BA Hons degree in photography, which keeps my “eye” on the straight and narrow when it comes to the finer details of retouching and manipulation and compositing.

I have now been on the Photoshop adventure for 17 years and run a successful photo restoration business and now both wedding retouching aimed at wedding photographers and The Photo Retoucher’s photo retouching services aimed at commercial, magazines, fashion models and agencies.

Photoshop and photo retouching and manipulation is my passion. Every image is a new journey and requires a new focus, love and attention just like the first. Hopefully this shows in the examples on this site and all of my retouching work.

I look forward to working with you
